title: Ranked is a joke
body:
Plays ranked.
ADC afks. 4v5
Janna then afks. 3v5.
Jarvan afks. 2v5.
Only my mate and I playing in a 2v5 and yet we lost lp for that.
GG matchmaking

(btw, not sure if this topic is in the right section of the forums)

replies.body: well, ranked is intentionally rigged by riot, they do cheat, lost my lost ranked game cause riot intentionally dc'd me in it

Because if you lost no LP for having it be a 4v5 it would be exploitable and many games would have someone taking a dive and losing LP so the other people don't have to, I guess. I would like it if they did something like, half your LP losses and give the leavers the LP loss you were meant to get in addition.

This theory is so flawed, every person in this game is an asshole as far as I'm concerned so no one would ever volunteer to AFK. But I agree with the remaining players should have LP loss halved and all their LP loss added to the AFKs LP loss. People should lose 75LP for leaving a game, that would stop people.

Don't you just love how we get punished for all the psychologically insecure muppets who we unfortunately play this game with?    
There really should be a name and shame post. I know it's against policy, but that policy can go to hell. Especially when the people who actually want to play the game are the ones who suffer.   Weed out the muppets and get rid of them.      Give us a tribunal!!
Why do we even lose lp in games where its a 4v5 or less?

Well idk, go ask riot to look over games that u complain about, so instead of reporting the afks, complain about the match and mention it to riot workers / gamers, because it isn't fair toward anyone, even the guys on the enemy team, because im sure that they'd like a challenge when playing ranked, because i know i most definitely would :)
Yeah, shit happens to everyone. I've played a 1v5 in promos.
